name: TargetSmart Communications
overview: TargetSmart Communications compiles and maintains a national database of registered voters and the unregistered voting age population that contains contact information, voting, geographic, and demographic information on nearly 250 million adults. TargetSmart voter data is compiled directly from state and county government sources in conjunction with the National Voter File Co-Op, a joint venture of State Democratic Parties to offer the best and most up-to-date voter lists to Democrats, their consultants and allies, and non-partisan organizations. TargetSmart provides political organizations and campaigns with a highly-accurate, robust set of capabilities that support a variety of political purposes, including fundraising, voter targeting and contact, voter registration, GOTV, and constituent management.
